ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: A new yahoo group
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, in case you haven t noticed, the moderators on this group have been working to prevent the spam. ... I try to make sure things remain relevant, but I
ygData.messageBody:
> > I sort of enjoy the newbie questions and silly
> > posts...
> Me too as for the newbie questions that is the main reason the new
> group was formed to keep the quwstions and strings on EQ and not on
> spam, and "check out this website and the pics...ect".
>
Well, in case you haven't noticed, the moderators on this group have been
working to prevent the spam.
>
> maybe I used words to "strong" for some but there are people who just
> what to get and share info. on eq. Other groups allow non-EQ strings
> and posts. That what we are trying to Avoid here. "Just EQ, and
> nothing but the EQ ma'am" a para-phrasa from the old TV show "DRAGNET"
> Wolff
>
I try to make sure things remain relevant, but I don't want to be a total
nazi and not let people have fun.
Hmm.. Technically since this is a discussion of your list, it's not really a
discussion of EverQuest itself. So would this message not be allowed on your
list? ;-P
Don't mind me. I'm just being silly.
If you are staying on this list too it would be cool if you shared any
interesting info on playing strategies with this list as well. :-)
luv,
-Su
